Text.Page:
We need to thin out the ranks of our enemies.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:12#17#Red Lash marauders} around the slaver markets of Mistmoor Island.

When you're finished, report to Taniel at Vindicator Outpost.
Keep up the good work, <PCCLASS:lcase>. For the federation!

Your targets are {@LinkCreature:12#17#Red Lash marauders}.

I'm sorry, but you have not neutralized enough enemies to complete this mission.
